svg.text: How Treaty, Indigenous, and Meta-Governance Frameworks Coordinate During Peace Operations
• Community-controlled healing and restoration • Traditional Territory protection and sovereignty
• Ecosystem regeneration and biodiversity recovery • Economic justice and reparations implementation
• Cultural revitalization and language restoration • Seven-generation accountability for future impacts
• Ceremonial governance and ritual-based stewardship • Planetary health and inter-species relationship healing
Crisis Response (0-48 hours) → Implementation (weeks-months) → Regenerative Transition (years-generations)
